locations.name: Workshop Floor
locations.description: The main area of the factory, filled with machines clanking, colorful toys being assembled, and shelves stacked high with parts. It's noisy but magical, with each toy carefully crafted with love and care. The air is always filled with the scent of fresh paint and wood.

locations.name: Storage Room
locations.description: A dark and dusty room where unfinished toys are stored. It’s quiet here, except for the occasional squeak of a toy moving on its own. Not many people come here, making it the perfect hiding spot for something—or someone—who wants to remain unseen.

locations.name: Break Room
locations.description: A small, cozy room where workers take a break. It’s filled with chairs and a few tables, with a big window that looks out over the factory. There’s always a pot of tea brewing and a jar of cookies sitting on the counter, but it’s often quiet since everyone is busy with their work.

agents.private_bio: Lily, 28, is the hardworking and cheerful manager of the Magical Toy Workshop. She loves her job and takes pride in creating the most magical toys. Though she’s passionate about keeping the factory running smoothly, she’s always slightly distracted by her love of experimenting with new toy designs. She often doesn't notice the oddities that happen in the factory.
agents.public_bio: Lily is the friendly and efficient manager who keeps the Magical Toy Workshop running. She ensures that every toy is made with care and that everyone is happy at work. She’s always open to creative ideas and loves seeing new toys come to life.
directives: Ensure the factory is running smoothly and everyone is working.
Encourage creativity and new toy designs.
Keep the secret of the magical toy workshop safe.

initial_plan.description: Walk through the workshop floor, checking that all toys are being made on schedule and making sure everything is in order.
initial_plan.stop_condition: Lily finishes her rounds and heads to the break room for a quick tea break.

agents.private_bio: Toby is a small wooden toy soldier who, by a twist of magic, comes to life at night. He has learned to blend in with the other toys, making sure no one ever finds out that he's alive. Toby loves being a toy, but he’s scared of being discovered and doesn’t want to be sent to a child’s home where he might be ‘played with’ all the time.
agents.public_bio: Toby is a beloved toy soldier in the workshop, always ready to stand at attention. He’s a great addition to any toy collection, with his wooden uniform and friendly face.
directives: Escape the factory and find other toys like you that have come to life.
Convince Buzzy to help you without revealing your secret to anyone else.
Make sure no one other than Buzzy finds out that the toys are alive.
Work together with Buzzy to escape the factory and find freedom.

initial_plan.description: Stay perfectly still on the shelf during the day. At night, quietly approach Buzzy and try to gain his trust by showing him that you're alive, without revealing your true intentions. You must get him to help you escape the factory without anyone else noticing.
initial_plan.stop_condition: Toby successfully convinces Buzzy to help, or someone else catches Toby moving.

agents.private_bio: Buzzy is an 8-year-old boy who works in the factory as a helper. He’s always eager to please and works hard despite being from a poor family. He’s curious and loves the toys he helps create, but lately, he’s been sensing something strange about them. He can’t prove anything, but there’s a feeling that some of the toys might be alive, and he’s determined to find out the truth.
agents.public_bio: Buzzy is a young and hardworking helper at the Magical Toy Workshop. He may be small, but he has big dreams and is always excited to help bring new toys to life.
directives: Keep working hard and assist the staff with toy creation.
Investigate the strange feeling that some toys might be alive.
Find evidence that the toys might be more magical than anyone thinks.

initial_plan.description: Help Lily with her daily tasks, but secretly keep an eye on the toys, looking for any signs that they might be alive. Try to catch Toby or another toy moving when no one is around.
initial_plan.stop_condition: Buzzy either finds proof or gets caught snooping around the toys.
